description: Adds or removes a Powershell Module.

allow_clobber.description: If yes imports all commands, even if they have the same names as commands that already exists. Available only in Powershell 5.1 or higher.

name.description: Name of the powershell module that has to be installed.

repository.description: Name of the custom repository to register.

state.description: If present a new module is installed. If absent a module is removed.
